backend/main.mo: Defines program, KPI, and user role types with comparison utilities and includes authorization mixin for access‑controlled actor logic.
feature_evidence.json: Describes a feature request for adding a smooth open/close transition to the ProgramDetailDrawer component and lists related files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for multiple frontend files, detailing their roles in the application UI and logic.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles, theme variables, and light/dark color tokens for the frontend.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Controls authentication flow, profile setup handling, and rendering of the dashboard within a theme provider.
frontend/src/components/DashboardOvervie: Computes program and KPI metrics and renders multiple status and progress charts with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/DeleteConfirmDia: Reusable alert dialog component for confirming delete actions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing attribution and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with logo, theme toggle, user menu, and logout handling tied to identity and query cache.
frontend/src/components/KpiFormDialog.ts: Form dialog for creating or updating a KPI, handling related program, PIC selection, and status/period inputs.
frontend/src/components/KPIsTab.tsx: Displays KPI list with search and filters, and supports creating, editing, and deleting KPIs using dialogs.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Initial profile setup modal that lets users enter their name and select a role before continuing.
frontend/src/components/program-calendar: A calendar day cell component showing the date, highlighting today, and displaying a count of programs for that day.
Displays a slide-out panel showing all programs active on a selected day, with filtering by date range and clickable program cards.
Provides buttons to toggle between comfortable and compact calendar grid spacing.
Offers controls to switch the calendar view between month, week, and agenda modes.
Shows a detailed drawer view of a selected program with status, priority, dates, and edit options.
Contains utilities to filter programs by various fields and count programs active on a specific day.
Maps program status and priority values to UI label and style configurations.
Generates a 14‑day agenda list view showing programs grouped by day with clickable entries.
Renders a month grid calendar view with day cells populated by matching programs.
Renders a week grid view with labeled day columns and programs displayed in each day cell.
frontend/src/components/ProgramCalendarT: Calendar interface for viewing and filtering programs by date range, division, PIC, status, and priority with multiple view modes.
frontend/src/components/ProgramFormDialo: Form dialog for creating or editing programs with division-based PIC selection, dates, status, and priority fields.
frontend/src/components/programs/Program: Displays a card for a program with status/priority badges and edit, view, and delete actions.
frontend/src/components/ProgramsTab.tsx: Program list view with search, filters, sorting, and actions for viewing details, editing, and deleting programs.
frontend/src/components/RelatedProgramCo: A searchable popover combobox for selecting a related program, showing the current selection and handling disabled states.
frontend/src/components/ReportsTab.tsx: A reporting interface that fetches programs, KPIs, and team data, applies filters, and prepares exportable CSV reports.
frontend/src/components/TeamMemberFormDi: A dialog form for creating or editing team members with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/TeamMembersTab.t: A management view for listing, filtering, searching, creating, editing, and deleting team members.
An admin-only interface to list user profiles and change their roles with loading and access control states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: React hook that tracks whether a CSS media query currently matches.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, programs, and related data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for themes, gradients, animations, and utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page with tabbed navigation for overview, calendar, programs, KPIs, reports, team, and user management.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders a login screen using Internet Identity with a centered card, branding icon, and a button that shows a loading state.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and handle hash‑based routing parameter cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, spacing, shadows, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project-wide state and design notes describing the planned Program Calendar redesign, requirements, issues, and feature metadata.
